ABOUT_US.TITLE: About Mostar Bus
ABOUT_US.DESCRIPTION: Welcome to Mostar Bus, where we deliver safe, reliable, and comfortable travel experiences across the historic and picturesque city of Mostar. Whether you're commuting for work or sightseeing, our modern fleet ensures your journey is pleasant and efficient.
ABOUT_US.FAQ_Q1: What routes does Mostar Bus cover?
ABOUT_US.FAQ_A1: We cover all major routes within Mostar, including key tourist attractions, business districts, and residential areas. For a detailed route map, visit our Schedule.
ABOUT_US.FAQ_A2: Tickets can be purchased online through our website, via our mobile app, or directly at ticket counters at Mostar's bus stations.
ABOUT_US.FAQ_Q3: Do you offer discounts for students or seniors?
ABOUT_US.FAQ_A3: Yes, we offer discounted fares for students and senior citizens. Please present valid identification when purchasing tickets to avail of these discounts.
